verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: violates] [ARG1: the U.S. Constitution ’s First Amendment] [ARGM-TMP: when he blocks critics on Twitter for political speech] , a judge ruled Wednesday .

President Donald Trump violates the U.S. Constitution ’s First Amendment [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: he] [V: blocks] [ARG1: critics on Twitter] [ARGM-CAU: for political speech] , a judge ruled Wednesday .
